query:
SELECT 
  po.customerOrderNumber,
  po.status as order_status,
  pw.waveNumber,
  pw.status as wave_status
FROM pickingOrders po
LEFT JOIN pickingWaves pw ON po.waveId = pw.id
WHERE po.customerOrderNumber LIKE 'PED-%'
ORDER BY po.id DESC;
